message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm looking for $250 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $180.
I understand that $180 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we discuss $210?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $210 is still a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $190.
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $190, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $195?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $195. How about we meet at $185?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $192, as it's already below my minimum price. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm happy to make the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
